product.title: BKIND Conditioner Bar in Multi
product.body_html: Complete your zero-waste beauty routine with BKIND's moisturizing conditioner bar. Made locally in Quebec using natural and effective ingredients, it will soften, moisturize, and revitalize your hair while leaving a wonderful fresh scent of orange and eucalyptus. Perfect for all hair types. 55 g (about 50 uses).
